data.name: Iron Disco sounds and themes
data.detailed_description:
This DLC contains the main tracks and themes from the original Iron Disco game, as well as three Full HD videos from the game.
You can find the files in the media folder with the installed game (by default * \ Steam \ steamapps \ common \ Iron Disco \ Media)
Sound:
  • Cyber Skull.mp3 - 06.48
  • Acid spider.mp3 - 01.27
  • Cosmic neon.mp3 - 02.30
  • Dr_Lee Transfiguration.mp3 - 02.37
  • Falling green ball.mp3 - 01.56
  • Infection.mp3 - 02.04
  • Introduction.mp3 - 02.10
  • Living dark gate.mp3 - 04.47
  • Pop Corn.mp3 - 02.04
  • Retro island theme.mp3 - 01.00
  • Soldier's Party.mp3 - 02.15
Video:
  • Cyber Skull.mp4
  • Dr_Lee Transfiguration.mp4
  • Living dark gate.mp4

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 5 1024Vram
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN10
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz
  • Graphics: GEFORCE GTX 10

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

This DLC is for adults only.
